tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hand_geometry_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  hand_length FLOAT,
  hand_width FLOAT,
  finger_length FLOAT,
  finger_width FLOAT,
  attendance_status VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE employee_attendance (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    time_in TIME NOT NULL,
    time_out TIME
);

CREATE TABLE attendance_record (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT REFERENCES employee_info(employee_id),
    date DATE,
    time_in TIME,
    time_out TIME
);
